title: Broken Mirror
alt: 'I see you're in this mood again.' 'I am always in this mood.'
transcript:
[Black Hat and Cueball stand in a bedroom. There is a broken mirror on the floor at Black Hat's feet.]
Black Hat: Oops. Guess this means seven more years of the illusion that my actions somehow influence the indifferent hand of probability which governs our lives.[Black Hat looks down at the broken shards of glass on the floor.]Cueball: Plus like half an hour of sweeping.
Black Hat: No, I think I'll leave it.
Cueball: You'll get glass in your feet.Black Hat: Eccles. 9:2â€”All things come alike to all: to the clean, and to the unclean.
Black Hat: My fate is as these shards.
Cueball: Dude, chill. It's just a vanity mirror.
Black Hat: All is vanity mirrors.
